11121.content:
The reasoning behind wearing his sandals to get another burrito in his own home was beside yourself. The reality of the situation, though, was you were trapped under your friends ungodly big foot and there was no chance of escaping unless Gabe allowed you to go. The only problem was Gabe had no idea that you were actually under his sole.

" These sandals are really comfortable today..." Gabe said pondering why as he walked.

Little did he know your body was making comfortable for him. Gabe continued towards the kitchen for another burrito. Upon grabbing it he remembered you, not you being under his foot, but that fact he hadn't seen you in a while. Gabe walked into the living room wondering where you were.

" Hey Jon, where the hell are you?" Gabe asked, his body now firmly standing in place and bearing down on your frame.

" DOWN HERE!!!" you screamed as if it would magically pass through his sole and make it to his ears.

After a few minutes of standing Gabe sat down on the couch still thinking of where you were. This was welcomed by you as your body started to reform into it's normal shape. Now you had to figure out how to escape from the sandal with it still pinning you down between it and Gabe's sole. Meanwhile Gabe enjoyed the burrito. He still was oblivious to your being under his foot. Nothing you tried worked either, trying to pound on his foot and yelling didn't help at all.

" Well, maybe he went home for a bit. I guess I could go exercise until he comes back," Gabe said, " Need some shoes though."

With that Gabe stood up crushing you into his footwear again as his weight returned. You tried to scream again but his foot muffled it. Luckily he was going to change shoes so you could get free from his giant foot. A few more steps and home free...
